name: unashamedly
content:

in a way that shows someone is not ashamed or embarrassed: The school's headmistress is unashamedly traditional and refuses to allow the girls to wear trousers. She wants the whole wedding to be unashamedly romantic. See
unashamed
More examplesFewer examplesShe was aware of all the people staring unashamedly at her.The report is unashamedly biased. He always said unashamedly that he wanted to be rich and famous.
